::: {.tabdiv}

```{r}
# Load/set options ----
# Load metrics options
metrics_options <- c("Select a metric" = "", "Richness" = "richness")

# Add selectors ----
# Filter selector
selectInput(
   inputId = "diversitySelect",
   label = "Select metric", 
   choices = metrics_options
)

selectInput(
   inputId = "diversityGroup",
   label = "Select level", 
   choices = c("All" = "all", "Fishes" = "fishes"),
   selected = "all"
)

# Add contextual information ----
tags$div(
  id = "diversity_title",
  class = "rtitle_class",
  textOutput("selectedMetric"),
  style = "font-style: normal !important;"
)

tags$div(
  id = "context_info_div",
  class = "context_info",
  textOutput("contextMetric")
)
```
